p: Recall from above that a relative shift towards society-centric research on transport (and mobility) justice can be identified. Several of the contributions in this VSI are in line with, and consolidate, this trend through focus on a variety of actors that are often somehow ‘marginalised’ within the urban realm. These actors exemplify the lack of a just politics of mobility and, at the same time, propose practices that can potentially ground the construction of novel spaces for fair deliberation.
